means: （美国纽约州的）肖陶扩湖，肖陶扩村（为夏季教育性集会中心）

sentence.Network_en: The turning point in his life came when Carnegie encountered the Chautauqua movement.
sentence.Network_cn: 比较:当卡耐基偶然碰上肖托夸夏季教育集会运动,他人生的转折点出现了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 C_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... chaussure 鞋类 chautauqua 讲习集会的 chauve-souris 蝙蝠.
chautauqua 美国湖名;文化讲习会 chauve-souris chauvinism 盲目的爱国心,沙文主义 chauvinist 盲目的爱国者 chauvinistic 盲目的爱国心的,沙文主义的 chauvinistically.
chaustegue 乔斯特格, chautauqua 夏季演讲娱乐会, chautard 肖塔尔

list.abs: chautauqua 肖托卡, chautauquas 肖托夸, chautauquan 肖托夸统
读书会的起源,可以追溯至西元1870年时美国的学托扩运动(Chautauqua Movement)。 而此运动影响到一位叫做Oscar Olsson的瑞典中学教师。他在美国考察此活动时受到启发.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: named after Chautauqua, a county in New York State, where such an institution was first set

auth_sentence.content: I paged through the scrapbook of Edward Maro, a Chautauqua-circuit magician who played the mandolin and did hand shadows.
auth_sentence.res_content: I paged through the scrapbook of Edward Maro, a Chautauqua-circuit magician who played the mandolin and did hand shadows.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I paged through the scrapbook of Edward Maro, a Chautauqua-circuit magician who played the mandolin and did hand shadows.
